original_text: They used music to serve the Lord in his special tent where he met with his people. After King Solomon built the Lord's temple in Jerusalem, they served the Lord there. They obeyed the rules that told them how to do their work.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 예루살렘에서 여호와의 성전을 세울 때까지 그들이 회막 앞에서 찬송하는 일을 행하되 그 계열대로 직무를 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: They used music to serve the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주님을 섬기기 위해 음악을 사용했습니다

sentences.original_text: where he met with his people
After King Solomon built the Lord's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕이 주님의 성전을 지은 후에

sentences.original_text: that told them how to do their work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 자신들의 일을 하는 방법을 알려주는 규칙을
